description: I. Correspondence dated Apr/May 2008 between, George W. Bridge (Master Cutler, The Company of Cutlers in Hallamshire), Richard Caborn MP and John Healey MP regarding local concern over the effects of changes in the rating of empty buildings in Sheffield and South Yorkshire. 3 p. II. Letter dated 24/04/2008 from Jim Knight MP to Hazel Blears MP regarding the concerns of Weymouth and Portland Cahmber Commerce relating to the effects of changes in the rating of empty buildings. 1 p. III. Email correspondence dated July 2008 between Danielle Yong (Public Affairs Officer, Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors Communications), John Healey MP And Marcus Riddell regarding the impact of the Rating (Empty Properties) Act 2007. Incl. report by RICS public affairs. 5 p. IV. Letter dated 27/03/2007 from James Lowman (Chief Executive, Assoc. of Convenience Stores) to Phil Woolas MP regarding the recommendation from the Lyons Review to introduce local supplementary business rates. 1 p.
